segments.text: I see a kitchen that is generally quite neat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, there's a startling amount of water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is clearly running, and it's just gushing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A large puddle is forming, spreading across the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying a plate stands right in it, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel her foot getting wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she hasn't reacted at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a lot of water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets below are already getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't imagine how she could miss something so obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a real shame to see a perfectly good kitchen getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window looks so peaceful, which makes this even more bizarre.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a striking contrast between inside and out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tranquility outside amplifies the chaos brewing within.
segments.speaker: PAR
